mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS CODE_CD, USER_NM AS CODE_NM FROM jmes.TBL_USER WHERE 1 = 1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT USER_ID AS CODE_CD, USER_NM AS CODE_NM FROM jmes.TBL_USER WHERE 1 = 1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND ROLE_SEQ IN ('3000')
SELECT COMP_CD AS CODE_CD, COMP_NM AS CODE_NM ,COMP_NM AS `text`, CAST(COMP_CD AS CHAR) AS `value` FROM TBL_COMPANY WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORDER_COMPANY_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT COMP_CD AS CODE_CD, COMP_NM AS CODE_NM ,COMP_NM AS `text`, CAST(COMP_CD AS CHAR) AS `value` FROM TBL_COMPANY WHERE 1 = 1 AND FAMILY_COMPANY_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT COMP_CD AS CODE_CD, COMP_NM AS CODE_NM ,COMP_NM AS `text`, CAST(COMP_CD AS CHAR) AS `value` FROM TBL_COMPANY WHERE 1 = 1 AND CO_COMPANY_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.COMP_CD AS CODE_CD, A.COMP_NM AS CODE_NM ,A.COMP_NM AS `text`, CAST(A.COMP_CD AS CHAR) AS `value` FROM TBL_COMPANY A INNER JOIN jmes.TBL_COMPANY_TYPE B ON B.COMP_CD = A.COMP_CD AND B.HIGH_TYPE = '1002' WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CO_COMPANY_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT A.COMP_CD AS CODE_CD, A.COMP_NM AS CODE_NM ,A.COMP_NM AS `text`, CAST(A.COMP_CD AS CHAR) AS `value` FROM TBL_COMPANY A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.COMP_CD = 'CMP0076' ) Z

SELECT LOC_NM AS `text`, CAST(LOC_SEQ AS CHAR) AS `value`, LOC_NM AS `CODE_NM`, CAST(LOC_SEQ AS CHAR) AS `CODE_CD` FROM TBL_WAREHOUSE_LOCATION WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND WAREHOUSE_CD = #{WAREHOUSE_CD}

SELECT B.STAFF_SEQ, A.COMP_CD, B.STAFF_NM, B.STAFF_TEL, B.STAFF_EMAIL FROM TBL_COMPANY A INNER JOIN TBL_COMPANY_STAFF B ON A. COMP_CD = B.COMP_CD AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.COMP_CD = #{COMP_CD}
SELECT EQUIP_SEQ AS CODE_CD, EQUIP_NM AS CODE_NM FROM TBL_EQUIP WHERE 1 = 1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT EQUIP_SEQ AS CODE_CD, EQUIP_NM AS CODE_NM FROM jmes.TBL_EQUIP WHERE 1 = 1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND PROCESS_TYPE = 'MPR010' ORDER BY FACTORY_AREA, CAST(IFNULL(SUBSTRING_INDEX(EQUIP_ID, '-', -1), 0) AS UNSIGNED)
SELECT ROLE_SEQ AS CODE_CD, ROLE_NM AS CODE_NM FROM TBL_ROLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY ROLE_NM

SELECT COMP_CD AS CODE_CD, COMP_NM AS CODE_NM ,COMP_NM AS `text`, CAST(COMP_CD AS CHAR) AS `value` FROM TBL_COMPANY A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.CO_COMPANY_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM TBL_COMPANY_TYPE M, TBL_CODE N WHERE 1 = 1 AND M.COMP_CD = A.COMP_CD AND M.HIGH_TYPE IN ('1001', '1002', '1003', '1004') AND M.HIGH_TYPE = N.HIGH_CD AND M.COMP_TYPE = N.CODE_CD AND N.REF_CD = 'VTP010')
